TopicTitle: KSP crashes for no apparent reason

Articles.Content:
I resolved many issues with mods, but now KSP keeps crashing with no reason. I can't identify the problem in output logs, can anyone please identify the problem?

My Output log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/h1zf7slrdo4qn2u/output_log10.rar?dl=0

The crash happens on scene changes.

I was tracking the KSP.exe process, at the time of crash it occupied only 1 Gb of RAM.

Does this mean I have too many mods?

Edited February 12, 2015 by Enceos

I've been getting the same crash stuff as well, and a lot.

I've posted several about crashes, but people seem to sort of ignore them in general, or nobody has a clue.

In fact, I'm getting so ignored that despite the fact that I've been having LOTS of crashes recently and would love to know why the heck it's crashing, I've decided to use alt+12 to look out for exceptions.

Edited February 12, 2015 by smjjames
It looks like a Unity Engine instability.
Yeah, from those that I did get help on or for similar ones, it's either a memory leak, Unity having a brainfart, or both.
